/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/demo.dir/demo.cpp.o  -o ../bin/demo -rdynamic ../lib/libkfusion.a /usr/local/lib/libopencv_viz.so.2.4.13 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.13 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.13 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppc.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppi.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnpps.so -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt -ltbb /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so -lcuda -lOpenNI -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64: -Wl,-rpath-link,/usr/local/lib
